Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and deliver exceptional value. Given its quality and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the chance to own it for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that set it apart. I trust that you will find it to be a worthwhile investment. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
